trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Chippewa Falls
There was one other sighting in Chippewa Falls on or around March 31st 2011
divs: sighting detailsi recently made a post about a massive blue flash. looks like it could have been a transformer. seriously i never knew transformers could create light like that...linking videos to show what it pretty much looked like. *(two links moved to additional evidence section -- cms\sg). only thing i don't understand is if it is in fact a transformer do they go out in clear weather?
